description: Copy number variations in the region 16p12.2 (exact position on the chromosome: Chr16:21950135-22431889 (GRCh37), are rare, pathological mutations in the human genome. It is a risk variation for neuropsychiatric diseases like schizophrenia (Kirov et al. 2014, [10.1016/j.biopsych.2013.07.022](https://doi.org/10.1016/j.biopsych.2013.07.022))
title: 16p12.2 copy number variation syndrome (520kb)
